org.fhaes.fhrecorder.model

Class FHX2_Sample

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fhaes.fhrecorder.model.FHX2_Sample
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ErrorTrackerInterface

    public class FHX2_Sample
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, ErrorTrackerInterface
    FHX2_Sample Class. This class is used to represent a sample in the FHX2 data.
    Author:
    Alex Beatty, Clayton Bodendein, Kyle Hartmann, Scott Goble
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:
